channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WIRED Tests Dozens of Air Purifiers a Year. Here’s What We Look For (2025)
item.description: WIRED’s air quality expert breaks down what we—and you—should consider when assessing one of these popular appliances.

item.title: Substack writers can now direct US readers to (often cheaper) web-based subscriptions on iOS
item.description: Substack's iOS app rolls out support for web-based payments, which can save subscribers money.

item.title: Hank Green’s Focus Friend app is climbing the App Store charts — and it’s extremely cute
item.description: If you fail to stay focused, you will make an anthropomorphic bean very sad, because its knitting project depends on your ability to stay on task.

item.title: X’s declining Android app installs are hurting subscription revenue
item.description: X is struggling on Android with installs down by 49% year-over-year as of June 2025.

item.title: 9 Picks of the Best Gaming Mouse, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: From wired to wireless to ultralight, we've tested dozens of gaming mice to find the best for work, your next MMO, and everything in between.

item.title: WIRED Roundup: Why GPT-5 Flopped
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we dig into WIRED’s latest—from crude deportation memes to GPT-5’s negative reception.

item.title: Jackery Explorer 1000 Deal: $350 Off Battery Bank Right Now
item.description: Save cash and store power with a massive discount on this portable battery bank.

item.title: The West Texas Measles Outbreak Has Ended
item.description: According to state health officials, a measles outbreak that started in an undervaccinated community and killed two children is now over.

item.title: Pixel 10, AI capabilities, and everything else we expect out of the Made by Google 2025 event
item.description: Dive into what we can expect from the Made by Google 2025 event, where the tech giant will debut its Pixel 10 lineup.

item.title: Texas attorney general accuses Meta, Character.AI of misleading kids with mental health claims
item.description: Texas attorney general Ken Paxton is investigating Meta and CharacterAI over claims they deceptively market chatbots as mental health tools, raising c...
